info.description:
Complete enterprise-grade API for the Kthulu framework

This API provides authentication, user management, organization management,
and ERP-lite modules including contacts, products, invoices, inventory, and calendar.

## Authentication

Most endpoints require authentication via JWT Bearer token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your-jwt-token>
```

## Module Tags

Endpoints are tagged by module for selective generation:
- `@kthulu:core` - Core framework functionality
- `@kthulu:module:auth` - Authentication module
- `@kthulu:module:user` - User management module
- `@kthulu:module:org` - Organization management module
- `@kthulu:module:contacts` - Contacts module
- `@kthulu:module:products` - Products module
- `@kthulu:module:invoices` - Invoices module
- `@kthulu:module:inventory` - Inventory module
- `@kthulu:module:calendar` - Calendar module
info.title: Kthulu API

Retrieves items that are below their reorder point

Authenticates a user and returns JWT tokens
Invalidates the user's refresh token
Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token

post.description: Resends the email confirmation code to the user

BearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from /auth/login endpoint. Format: Bearer <token>
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
